content.html: Covid's ripped thru Seward HQ the last fortnight, we're finally coming out the other side. It's been HELL. 1-yr-old had temp pushing 40°C for 48hrs, was awful to feel so helpless. She's bounced back thankfully and is her old smiley self - me & @MrAndrew not so much just yet...
